products.title: Splash Tango Orange Perfect Fit Roller Blind
products.description: Splash tango orange is a bright and sunny orange perfect fit roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out perfect fit blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this fabulous orange blind is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.
